# 5P420-230260_A RISO Bulk Aviation Fuel
## Request for Standing Offer

### Solicitation Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Parks Canada Agency (PC) invites qualified contractors to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the provision of Bulk Aviation Turbine Fuel (Jet A-1) to several National Parks in Western Canada.

### Service Requirements

The successful contractor will be required to supply mobile fuel tankers containing Aviation Turbine Fuel (Jet A-1) in accordance with Standard CAN/CGSB 3.23-2023 to national parks in British Columbia, Saskatchewan, Alberta, Northwest Territories, and Manitoba, as requested, between May 1, 2024, and April 30, 2026, with an option to extend the contract by one year.

The contractor may also be required to provide fueling operators and drivers to support the delivery and refueling of the helicopters in the event of a forest fire.
